channel.title: Construction Technology Pakistan
channel.description: Recent content on Construction Technology Pakistan

item.title: About
item.description: Construction Technology Pakistan SMC-PRIVATE LIMITED is a company approved by the Security Exchange Commission of Pakistan. It’s registered with FBR at 9548293. The official address of the company is, 22- C, Sunset lane#2, Phase-2, Extension DHA 75500. The company telephone numbers are 009221-35885217 and 00922135392899. The later number is connected to fax as well. The National Tax number of this business entity is 0000. CTLP, abbreviated in short is geared up to take up tender jobs and also carryout private and its own works.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact us. We are always there to have a candid chat. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
